original: Hult, Jonas Rudolf, bruksdisponent, Boxholm, f. 1/9/91 i Osage City, USA, av Carl; Olof H. o. Elise Olsson. G. 25 m. Eva Starnberg. Barn: Eva Helena f. 27. — Genomg. hand:-inst. Bruksbokhåll. v. EdsvaKla Bruk 13, kalkylator v. Hellefors Bruk 16-18, kamrer v. Bångbro järnverk 18-28, v. A-B Fors Bruk 29-31, disp. där t. 33^, samtid, diriassist. v. Motala verk-st., disp. o. verkst. dir. v. Boxholms A-B sed. 33, led. av dess styr. Led. av styr. i Stafs Grufve A-B, i Gu-sums Bruks- o. Fabr. A-B, f. Motala Ströms regler :fören., f. Östergötl. il. musei- o. fornrn rfören., f. östgötagården, f. öistgöta nat. i Upps., central-’S’tyr,. f. östergötl. Ensk. Bank, styr. £. Rosenforis Brak, suppl. i styr. f. Stri-bergs Gruve A-B, huvudman o. sityr:-led. i Göstrings här. o. Skennimge stads sparb., suppl. i styr. f. Sv. slcDgssällsk. Led. av komm :fuldm. i Ekeby, av Östergötl. o. ^örml. hand:-kamm. o. dess skiljend. Av hand:-kamm. godk. granskn :man. Res. t. Engl. o. Tyskl. RVO, Scoutunion, hed :t.
translated: Hult, Jonas Rudolf, works manager, Boxholm, born September 1, 1891 in Osage City, USA, son of Carl, Olof H. and Elise Olsson. Married on May 25 with Eva Starnberg. Children: Eva Helena born in 1927. Jonas attended commercial school and worked as an accountant at EdsvaKla Bruk from 1913, a calculator at Hellefors Bruk from 1916 to 1918, an accountant at Bångbro järnverk from 1918 to 1928, and deputy manager at A-B Fors Bruk from 1929 to 1931. He was then promoted to manager, serving there until 1933. He also served as deputy assistant director at Motala verkst. and manager and director of Boxholms A-B from 1933. He was a member of the board for Stafs Grufve A-B, Gusums Bruks- o. Fabr. A-B, Motala Ströms regler fören., Östergötlands musei- o. fornrn rfören., Östgötagården, öistgöta nat. i Upps., central-Styr., Östergötlands Ensk. Bank, Stri-bergs Gruve A-B, head and board member of Göstrings här. o. Skennimge stads sparb., and a member of the board of the Swedish Society of Genealogists. He was also a member of the Ekeby municipal council and the Östergötland and Värmeland Chamber of Commerce, serving on its arbitration committee. He was an approved audit inspector for the Chamber of Commerce. He traveled to England and Germany and received the Royal Order of Vasa and was an honorary member of the Scout Union.

memberOf.name: Göstrings här. o. Skennimge stads sparb.
